Namespace SatStat

Classes

ComSettingsForm

DatabaseViewer

DataProvider

A provider of data from the SW layer to connected HW layer or stream. To send data out from the software to external connected device or simulation

DataReceiver

DataStream

A datastream that can be subscibed to trough a DataSubscription

DataSubscription

A DataSubscription contains information about what attribute and datatype a receiver is listening for, and provides methods for delivering the data to its receiver, and setting up a subscription internally

DB_ComSettingsItem

A class to encapsulate a database item for saved com settings required for LiteDB. Use this class when saving or retrieving COM settings to/from database

Instruction

Representing an instruction that can be run on the Hardware Layer

JSON

ObservableDouble

ObservableFloat

ObservableInt

ObservableLong

ObservableNumericValue<T>

Describes a value that can be observed. When the value is changed, a callback method is invoked passing the Observed value as parameter

ObservableNumericValueCollection

A collection of observable numeric values

ObservableNumericValueCollectionEnum

ParameterControlTemplate

An object of this class holds a collection of observable numeric values and can be saved and loaded from a LiteDatabase collection

ParameterControlTemplateDialog

SerialHandler

A class that is responsible for communicating on a serial port connection, and at the same time act as a data stream object

SocketHandler

Socket handler class

StateObject

StreamSimulator

TestConfiguration

An object of this class holds a queue of Instructions to run and a Parameter control template to use for observing values during a test-run. An instance of this class can also be saved and/or loaded from a LiteDatabase collection

ThreadHelper

A static class containing methods for running methods on a seperate thread. Internally handles winforms UI cross-threading compatibility

Structs

AppSettings

A struct that contains the application settings

COMSettings

A struct that contains different parameters that a COM connection needs

ConnectionParameters

InstructionEntry

SerialHandler.default_settings

SerialSettingsCollection

A struct containing fields for COM settings for serialization from JSON

Interfaces

IObservableNumericValue

An interface for ObservableNumericValue so that we can create lists without worrying about different generics in the same list
